bill.title: Higher Education Legislative Plan Grant Program; revise and clarify requirements related to income, residency and documentation.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 37-157-1, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Provides For The Higher Education Legislative Plan Grant Program; To Require Students To Submit An Application By The Deadline Set For The Mississippi Resident Tuition Assistance Grant Program; To Clarify The Method For Determining Residency Status; To Require That A Student's Successful Completion Of The Required High School Course Work Be Certified By The High School Counselor; To Raise The Annual Adjusted Gross Income Used For Purposes Of Determining A Student's Eligibility For The Program; To Require The Completion Of The Free Application For Federal Student Aid To Verify Annual Adjusted Gross Income; And For Related Purposes.
